channel.title: [718 - TPP] Normal/Curses - NPC's not hitting through Prayer? :C
channel.description:
As the title says none of the NPC's hit through Prayer, so when i make new bosses and finish them, its always people standing there grinding them because they do not hit anything, i have even taken off the aggro to make sure its not ''AFK'' able but since they dont hit anything through prayer people can go and kill them with a full inv of restore Flasks...
Soo now im pretty fed up with it so i want them to HIT through prayer but since im a newbie/novice coder i was in need for some help from the community :D
If there is anyfiles i need to Quote i will gladly do it<3
